long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expand Your Horizons: Our AI Helper Transforms Casual Viewing into a Rich Educational Experience on Netflix, Disney Plus!

FunFluen: Fluency Made Fun

From Watching to Speaking - The Cinematic Way to Fluency

ğŸŒŸ Introducing the Ultimate Subtitle Extension! ğŸŒŸ

ğŸš€ Elevate Your Viewing Experience with features you never knew you needed until now.

ğŸ‰ ChatGPT Meets Cinema: Your Personal AI Language Coach! (Beta)
"Transform Your Movie Watching into a Language Masterclass with AI.


ğŸ” Double-View Subs â€“ Why limit yourself to one? Switch between two subtitle languages in real-time! Multilingual movies? No problem.

ğŸ’¡ SnapMeanings â€“ Hover over words you donâ€™t understand and get instant translations. Dive deep into the context without missing a beat.

ğŸ¹ SwiftKeys Magic â€“ Shortcut your way to subtitle heaven. Toggle, switch, and adjust without the hassle.

â˜ï¸ SubsUploader Pro â€“ Have a preferred subtitle file? Upload with ease and sync perfectly with your movie.

ğŸ– SubsGrabber â€“ Discovering a gem of a movie without subtitles? Grab them in a jiffy with this feature.

ğŸ“– Phrase Wallet â€“ Found a memorable quote or phrase? Store it in your phrase wallet for later recall.

ğŸ” PhraseKeeper Plus â€“ Secure your saved phrases with enhanced protection, ensuring they're always there when you want to revisit them.

â¸ï¸ Smart Auto-Pause â€“ Your extension auto-pauses when you're looking up a word or phrase, ensuring you never lose your spot.

ğŸ—ºï¸ SubsNavigator â€“ Navigate through subtitles with ease. Jump to specific dialogues or scenes in seconds.

ğŸ‰ TripleTreat Subs â€“ For the true cinema aficionado. Engage with three subtitle languages simultaneously. Expand your linguistic horizons!

Elevate your movie nights. Dive deep into your favorite shows. Understand every dialogue. ğŸ¬

Immerse yourself like never before with the power of our cutting-edge subtitle extension. Let every word, phrase, and emotion resonate deeper.
